pages.text: $(li)The Flower Box can hold up to $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/carrot)Carrots$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/potato)Potatoes, $(/l)$(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/wheat_seeds)Wheat Seeds$(/l), Saplings, $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/red_mushroom)Red Mushrooms$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/brown_mushroom)Brown Mushrooms$(/l), and Flowers.$(br)$(li)They can be placed in the middle or to the side off a block in all directions too.
